{"id":1274953094,"question_id":3408,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1717307651,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1274953094/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count the Number of Special Characters I","memory":"8.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numberOfSpecialChars(string word) { //word consists of only lowercase and uppercase English letters.\n        int dict_lower[26];\n        int dict_upper[26];\n        for(int i=0; i<word.length(); i++) {\n            if(word[i]>='a' & word[i]<='z') \n                dict_lower[word[i]-'a']++;\n            else\n            dict_upper[word[i]-'A']++;\n        };\n\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<26; i++) {\n            if(dict_lower[i]>0 & dict_upper[i]>0)\n                ans++;\n        };\n\n        return ans; \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-the-number-of-special-characters-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
